en.today: A sweet energy follows you early this morning, dearest Aries, as the Libra moon and Jupiter align. This cosmic climate is perfect for snuggling under the covers and embracing pillow talk with that special someone before starting the day. If you're currently flying solo, harness these vibes by reinforcing yourself with positive thoughts. Please don't force yourself to be active when Luna squares Mars rx midafternoon, trusting your body and mind when they say it's time to rest. Find ways to evolve complicated relationships by nurturing and healing yourself first while the moon and Chiron face off later this evening.

Reach outside of yourself to find healing when Luna and Chiron face off tonight, tapping into your intuition and divine connection to cultivate inner peace.

If you must stay busy to calm your mind, prepare for Monday's arrival without abandoning wellness. Stay true to healthy routines when Luna opposes Chiron this evening, ensuring a full night of rest.
